DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - Black Rainbow Striped Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Rainbow tube socks are fun costume or athletic socks. The 19" tube socks are sized for kids and adults. The rainbow striped tube socks will run knee high for kids and ½ to ¾ knee high for adults. The black tube socks are high quality and durable and have colorful rainbow stripes of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple at the top. 75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex. Made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: The black tube socks have colorful rainbow stripes of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple at the top
75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex Made in the USA
